resources.string: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

Your user id has not been registered into our system.\nPlease sign up first to use our services.
Your account has not been activated yet.\nPlease contact your service provider to resolve this issue.
Your user account has not been approved .Please contact your service provider.
Your device has not been registered into our system.\nPlease contact your service provider and register device mac address to use our services

You have successfully registered to our system. Please check your email and click the activation link to complete your registration. \\n\\nYou can login to the system only after our team reviews your request once your have activated your account. This process might take time so you are requested to wait our email confirmation of your Registration approval.\\nIf you did not receive any email or face any other issue regarding registration process, please email us at info@artemisiaiofcaria.com
